Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, but considering its relevance and utility to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $13500. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who will appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential. We are confident that you will find the investment worthwhile, given its intrinsic value of $12000 to you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
